about.headline: Still a Studio. A multidisciplinary creative studio designing visuals that invite audiences to pause - a continuous act of stillness amid the noise.
about.description1: We are graphic designers and storytellers in an endless conversation with illustration, photography and film.
about.description2: We are made of matter in combustion. And believe us, there is power in being made of wonder.

step2.title: 2. Notice Everything
step2.description: Paying attention to possibilities, following curiosity.

step3.title: 3. Make a Plan
step3.description: Then name it. Structuring, but leaving room to explore.

step4.title: 4. Collect Seeds
step4.description: Gathering inspiration, materials and tiny treasures.

step6.title: 6. Take a Breath
step6.description: Stepping back, observing and letting the work speak.

contact.title: Still Here?
contact.description: You can send us an <email>e-mail</email>, but we also accept carrier pigeons.
